src:
Lihat Manchester United Ambyar, Harry Maguire Enggan Mencari Alasan
04 Nov 2019, 15:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek tengah Manchester United, Harry Maguire, tidak ingin mencari banyak alasan usai timnya ambyar saat berjumpa Bournemouth. Sebaliknya, pemain berusia 26 tahun ingin rekan-rekannya segera bangkit di laga selanjutnya.
Manchester United sebenarnya datang ke Vitality Stadium dengan modal bagis. Setan Merah menang dalam tiga laga tandang terakhir. Hanya saja, laga Sabtu (2/11/2019) tidak berjalan sesuai kehendak pada pemain United.
Bournemouth meraih kemenangan dengan skor 1-0. Gol kemenangan anak asuh Eddie Howe dicetak Joshua King di babak kedua. Mantang pemain akademi United tersebut mencetak gol usai membuat gerakan indah melewati Aaron Wan-Bissaka.
Hasil ini membuat Manhcester United kembali turun ke posisi 10 klasemen Premier League. Setan Merah baru meraih 13 poin dari sebelas laga yang sudah dimainkan pada musim 2019/2020 ini.
text:
See Manchester United Ambyar, Harry Maguire reluctant to find excuses
Nov 04 2019, 15:05 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United center back, Harry Maguire, does not want to look for many reasons after his team lost when he met Bournemouth. Instead, the 26-year-old wants his team-mates to get up in the next match.
Manchester United actually came to Vitality Stadium with good capital. The Red Devils won in the last three away games. It's just that the match Saturday (11/02/2019) did not go according to the will of the United players.
Bournemouth won with a score of 1-0. Eddie Howe's foster winning goal was scored by Joshua King in the second half. Challenge the United academy player to score a goal after making a beautiful move past Aaron Wan-Bissaka.
These results make Manhcester United back down to 10th place in the Premier League standings. The Red Devils only won 13 points from eleven games that have been played in this 2019/2020 season.
